title: Fever (Demo)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Before you came around, I was doing just fine
Usually, usually, usually, I don't pay no mind
And when it came down, I was looking in your eyes
Suddenly, suddenly, suddenly I can feel it inside
[Chorus]
I've got a fever, so can you check?
Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
And when you touch me baby, I turn red
I've got a fever, so can you check? (I've got a fever)
[Verse 2]
Every time you're close, I get out of breath
Wondering, wondering, wondering what'll happen next
Oh, is it my imagination? It's got my heart beat racing
Fallin' in, fallin' in, fallin' in, feel it in my chеst
[Chorus]
I've got a fever, so can you chеck?
Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
And when you touch me baby, I turn red
I've got a fever, so can you check? (I've got a fever)
[Post-Chorus]
Tell me what you wanna do right now
Tell me what you wanna do right now, now, now, now
Tell me what you wanna do right now
'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down (I've got a)
Tell me what you wanna do right now
Tell me what you wanna do right now, now, now, now
Tell me what you wanna do right now
'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down

[Chorus]
I've got a fever, so can you check?
Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
And when you touch me baby, I turn red (I turn red)
I've got a fever, so can you check? (I've got a fever)
[Post-Chorus]
Tell me what you wanna do right now
Tell me what you wanna do right now (I've got a fever)
Tell me what you wanna do right now
'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down (I've got a fever)
Tell me what you wanna do right now
Tell me what you wanna do right now (I've got a fever)
Tell me what you wanna do right now
'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down (I've got a fever)
